<br>

This workshop is organized and hosted by **[MAGPIE](https://www.sfu.ca/magpie.html)**.  
It is focused toward our graduate students, but anybody with interests in mathematical biology, evolutionary biology, infectious diseases, and statistics is welcome to join!

These pages are written by [Alex Beams](https://www.sfu.ca/~abeams/)

Thank you [Lars Berling](https://github.com/Lars-B) for this website template!
